name: FireRun (Frelude, Madélou)
description:
You are cursed.  Solve the puzzle before you burn all your environment and yourself.

In a confined space, gather the scrolls activating the exit in order to find peace. You cannot retrace your steps without burning yourself. Think quickly to your path because the curse prevents you from remaining static : your greatest danger is yourself...

This game was created for the Tri-Annual Game Jam  #1 (2020)
with the theme : "You are your ennemy".

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Key
  • Jump: Space
